episodes.title: Cult Leader Eligio Bishop Goes On Instagram Live During Trial
episodes.description:
Eligio Bishop went on Instagram Live during the Polygamist Cult Leader Trial where the defendant complained and voiced his concern that the judge tested positive for COVID-19. Bishop chose to not be present in the courtroom anymore because of it.

episodes.title: Eligio Bishop Leaves Court Fighting Judge for Trial Delay
episodes.description:
